column7: Principles of accompanying singers and instrumentalists, practical experience in accompanying, and facility in sight reading for keyboard performers. 2 to 4 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in music or consent of instructor.
